page.title: 05A TRADITIONAL FARMING FAMILY
page.content: Daisy and Fred are a traditional farming family.His parents were tenant farmers at Clock House farm,Little Sampford.Fred was born there in 1905. Although he had always wanted to be an engineer he left school at fourteen to follow his father into farming.Daisy born in London was a pupil teacher at Great Sampford School before she was married.Both staunch members of the Church.Daisy organist at Little Sampford Church and Fred a Curchwarden for twenty one years.On his fathers death the couple moved to Clock House, where subsequently Fred aquired the freehold.Their two daughters were born at the farm and their granddaughter Anna has put this survey onto the computer.Thus in two generations, the technology in one family has developed from the plough to the electronic computer.
